headline: CNN News Central
subHeadline: Soon: Biden Remarks On Trump's Threat to Democracy; Cindy McCain Speaks At Event Honoring Late Husband John; Biden Delivers Warning On Threats To Democracy; Biden Defends Milley After Trump Threatened Him. Aired 3-3:30p ET

utterances.speaker: JAKE TAPPER, CNN CHIEF WASHINGTON CORRESPONDENT
utterances.sentences: I have my team of experts with me. And Scott, let me play some of what we've heard from Donald Trump when it comes to accepting the results of the next presidential election.(BEGIN VIDEO CLIP)

utterances.speaker: UNIDENTIFIED FEMALE
utterances.sentences: Will you commit to accepting the results of the election regardless of the outcome?

utterances.speaker: DONALD TRUMP, FORMER PRESIDENT OF THE UNITED STATES
utterances.sentences: If I think it's an honest election, I would be honored to.They rigged the presidential election of 2020 and we're not going to allow them to rig the presidential election of 2024. We will win bigger and better than ever before. They rigged the presidential election in 2020 and we're not going to allow them to rig the presidential election in 2024. (END VIDEO CLIP)

utterances.speaker: TAPPER
utterances.sentences: It sure sounds like he's preparing to challenge the results if he doesn't win yet again.

utterances.speaker: SCOTT JENNINGS, CNN SENIOR POLITICAL COMMENTATOR
utterances.sentences: Yes. And the audience for the Biden speech today is that cohort of Republicans who just hate this. When they hear those soundbites, they don't want to relive the 2020 Election. They don't want to re-litigate this whole thing.And for Biden, you don't have to win them all. You just have to win a handful of them to make a difference in a state that was as close as Arizona or Wisconsin or Georgia. And I suspect this is going to be a recurring theme, even though Republicans hated it when he did it in the midterm, there is some empirical evidence that it worked, that there's enough center-right Independents and soft Republican voters that are taken in by this. Now, what has happened since then? Trump's been indicted several times.

utterances.speaker: TAPPER
utterances.sentences: Let's listen. Here is Cindy McCain, the widow of John McCain, the head of the world - the U.N. World Food Programme, introducing President Biden at this address. Let's listen in.

utterances.speaker: UNIDENTIFIED MALE
utterances.sentences: When will you stand against corruption, Mr. President?

utterances.speaker: UNIDENTIFIED MALE
utterances.sentences: (Inaudible) ask why you have yet to declare a climate emergency? Why have you yet to declare a climate emergency? Hundred of Arizonians have died.

utterances.speaker: UNIDENTIFIED MALE
utterances.sentences: Hundreds of Arizonians have died because you won't ...

utterances.speaker: BIDEN
utterances.sentences: Well, hang on one second. Hang on a second. I'll be happy to meet with you after I speak, okay?

utterances.speaker: UNIDENTIFIED MALE
utterances.sentences: You promised no new drilling on fossil fuels. Why have you yet to declare a climate emergency? Not (inaudible) ...
